room_title: Escape room "The Serial Doctor" by Glenwood Escape Room in Glenwood Springs
room_description: A doctor in a small rural town has a dark desire and it’s up to you and your friends to escape and let the authorities know of his dark secret! You don’t remember much about last night, just that you went out with your friends, and met a new one. Now, you have all woken up to some screams and to find yourself in a room together. One of your friends is missing, perhaps the new friend you made last night isn’t so friendly after all! He said he was a Doctor… Escape is the only option!
